WorkItem.Description:
Microsoft has made its Office UI avialable for ISV's to use it in their own products to get the Office Ribbon look and feel. Is there a way to get some samples of how to embed the 2010 Office UI Ribbon in web applications.
The license site does not work as it errors out when I try to get a license.
WorkItem.Summary: Using Office UI License for developing Ribbon in asp.net
